languages.text: "Не припомню, поскольку таковых случаев за время моей службы не было, и любого, кто утверждает обратное, я заставлю заплатить за подобное оскорбление вашей чести кровью. Ваше поведение в данном отношении всегда было безупречно. Но для людей, стоящих ниже, одно лишь бесценное внимание столь важной персоны как вы уже является разлагающим мораль, раздувающим самомнение и подрывающим дисциплину".

"None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."
languages.original_text: "Не припомню, поскольку таковых случаев за время моей службы не было, и любого, кто утверждает обратное, я заставлю заплатить за подобное оскорбление вашей чести кровью. Ваше поведение в данном отношении всегда было безупречно. Но для людей, стоящих ниже, одно лишь бесценное внимание столь важной персоны как вы уже является разлагающим мораль, раздувающим самомнение и подрывающим дисциплину".

If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the attitude of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

languages.text: "Nein, Truchsess, weil es keinen derartigen Fall gab, seit ich auf diesem Schiff diene. Sollte jemand etwas anderes behaupten, lasse ich ihn für die Befleckung Eurer Ehre mit Blut bezahlen. Euer Verhalten war in dieser Hinsicht stets makellos. Angesichts Eurer bedeutenden Position reicht allerdings das kleinste Zeichen von Anerkennung Eurerseits aus, um den Anstand junger Offiziere zu untergraben, was wiederum Selbstgefälligkeit und Disziplinlosigkeit nach sich ziehen kann."
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Truchsess, weil es keinen derartigen Fall gab, seit ich auf diesem Schiff diene. Sollte jemand etwas anderes behaupten, lasse ich ihn für die Befleckung Eurer Ehre mit Blut bezahlen. Euer Verhalten war in dieser Hinsicht stets makellos. Angesichts Eurer bedeutenden Position reicht allerdings das kleinste Zeichen von Anerkennung Eurerseits aus, um den Anstand junger Offiziere zu untergraben, was wiederum Selbstgefälligkeit und Disziplinlosigkeit nach sich ziehen kann."

languages.text: « Non, sénéchal, pour la simple raison que ça ne s'est jamais produit depuis que je sers sur ce vaisseau. Si quelqu'un osait prétendre le contraire, je lui ferais payer de son sang cet affront à votre honneur. Votre conduite à cet égard a toujours été irréprochable. Pour autant, au vu de l'autorité que vous exercez à bord, une simple démonstration d'attention de votre part suffit à nuire à la subordination des officiers subalternes et à attiser leur suffisance au point de compromettre la discipline au sein de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

traits.locale_text: « Non, sénéchal, pour la simple raison que ça ne s'est jamais produit depuis que je sers sur ce vaisseau. Si quelqu'un osait prétendre le contraire, je lui ferais payer de son sang cet affront à votre honneur. Votre conduite à cet égard a toujours été irréprochable. Pour autant, au vu de l'autorité que vous exercez à bord, une simple démonstration d'attention de votre part suffit à nuire à la subordination des officiers subalternes et à attiser leur suffisance au point de compromettre la discipline au sein de l'équipage. »

languages.text: «Nunca, senescal, pues no se ha dado jamás el caso en todo el tiempo que llevo al servicio de esta nave. Y si alguien afirmase lo contrario, le haría pagar con sangre tal insulto a su honor. Su conducta en ese sentido siempre ha sido intachable. Pese a todo, dado lo eminente de su cargo, una simple muestra de atención por su parte basta para erosionar el decoro de los oficiales más jóvenes, inflar su ego y socavar la disciplina».
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca, senescal, pues no se ha dado jamás el caso en todo el tiempo que llevo al servicio de esta nave. Y si alguien afirmase lo contrario, le haría pagar con sangre tal insulto a su honor. Su conducta en ese sentido siempre ha sido intachable. Pese a todo, dado lo eminente de su cargo, una simple muestra de atención por su parte basta para erosionar el decoro de los oficiales más jóvenes, inflar su ego y socavar la disciplina».

languages.text: 「ありませんよ、家令長、私がこの船に乗っている間、このようなケースは一度もありませんでしたから。もしそうでないと主張する者がいれば、そいつの血でもってあなたの名誉を侮辱した報いを受けさせましょう。この点に関して、あなたの行動には常に一点の曇りもありません。とはいえ、あなたの輝かしい地位を鑑みると、下級士官の礼儀を損ない、自己重要感を肥大化させ、起立を損なわせるには、あなたが少し気を配るだけで十分なのです」
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

traits.locale_text: 「ありませんよ、家令長、私がこの船に乗っている間、このようなケースは一度もありませんでしたから。もしそうでないと主張する者がいれば、そいつの血でもってあなたの名誉を侮辱した報いを受けさせましょう。この点に関して、あなたの行動には常に一点の曇りもありません。とはいえ、あなたの輝かしい地位を鑑みると、下級士官の礼儀を損ない、自己重要感を肥大化させ、起立を損なわせるには、あなたが少し気を配るだけで十分なのです」

languages.text: “一次都没有，总领。我在这艘船上服役了这么多年，您说过的情况从来都没有发生过。如果有人敢怀疑这一点，我一定会让那些人付出血的代价。您在这方面的举止从来都无可挑剔。不过，考虑到您的煊赫地位，您只要对某些下级军官表现出特别的关注，就足以让他们目中无人、妄自尊大，这会对船上的纪律产生不良影响。”
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."

traits.locale_text: “一次都没有，总领。我在这艘船上服役了这么多年，您说过的情况从来都没有发生过。如果有人敢怀疑这一点，我一定会让那些人付出血的代价。您在这方面的举止从来都无可挑剔。不过，考虑到您的煊赫地位，您只要对某些下级军官表现出特别的关注，就足以让他们目中无人、妄自尊大，这会对船上的纪律产生不良影响。”

languages.text: "Hiç aklıma gelmiyor Seneşal. Çünkü bu gemide hizmet ettiğim tüm o süre boyunca böylesi bir durum hiç yaşanmadı. Aksini iddia eden birisi çıkarsa seni aşağılamasının bedelini kendi kanıyla ödetirim. Bu husustaki davranışın, her zaman kusursuz olmuştur. Ancak yüksek mevkini göz önünde bulundurursak sıradan bir alaka göstermen bile kıdemsiz subayların davranışlarına zarar vermeye, kibir algılarını şişirmeye ve disiplinlerini sarsmaya yeterli gelecektir."
languages.original_text: "None, Seneschal, for there have been no such cases in the entire time I have served aboard this ship. If anyone were to claim otherwise, I would have them pay for insulting your honour with blood. Your conduct in this regard have always been spotless. Nevertheless, given your eminent position, a simple show of attention on your part is enough to erode the propriety of junior officers, inflate their sense of self-importance, and undermine discipline."
